title: RGBD Sensor Range longer than specification

content.raw:
The range of the depth portion of the RGBD sensor is longer than the range documented at [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api)

This is possible to miss as it is not on [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots)

I think it had been 10 meters in gazebo \(which was reasonable as the kinect 2 has an 8 or 10 meters range but ~5m with skeletal tracking\).  I am not sure what it was in the earlier versions of ignition.  The latest version has a much longer range.

This applies at least to X3 config 4, but possibly to other RGBD sensors as well.

‌

‌

This is possible to miss as it is not on #!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots

I think it had been 10 meters in gazebo (which was reasonable as the kinect 2 has an 8 or 10 meters range but ~5m with skeletal tracking). I am not sure what it was in the earlier versions of ignition. The latest version has a much longer range.

This applies at least to X3 config 4, but possibly to other RGBD sensors as well.
